docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    metadata-architecture.md
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: Metadata Architecture
docs.text:
flowchart
  direction TB

  subgraph Sources
    subgraph NRM
    end

    subgraph PostgreSQL
    end

    subgraph OtherSources
    end
  end

NRM --> ReviewDecision
PostgreSQL --> ReviewDecision
OtherSources --> ReviewDecision

subgraph Review[Metadata Review Process]
  ReviewDecision{Approved?}
end

subgraph EDW[Enterpise Data Wharehouse]
end

ReviewDecision --> |Yes| EDW
ReviewDecision --> |No| Sources
